thread.title: India vs South Africa 3rd ODI Live Scorecard and Ball by Ball Commentary of IND vs SA
thread.title_full: India vs South Africa 3rd ODI Live Scorecard and Ball by Ball Commentary of IND vs SA

author: Aamir Salati | India.com Sports Desk
title: India vs South Africa 3rd ODI Live Scorecard and Ball by Ball Commentary of IND vs SA
text:
India vs South Africa 3rd ODI Live Scorecard and Ball by Ball Commentary of IND vs SA By India.com Sports Desk on October 18, 2015 at 12:33 PM Comments Catch the Live Scorecard and Ball by Ball Commentary of India vs South Africa 3rd One-Day International (ODI) of the five match Paytm series. The series is currently levelled at one each. The IND vs SA match will start at 1:30 PM Indian Standard Time (IST) and will be played at the Saurashtra Cricket Association Stadium in Rajkot. You can catch the live scoreboard and ball by ball commentary of India vs South Africa 3rd ODI here . Also Watch: India vs South Africa 3rd ODI Free Live Streaming here The contest between India and South Africa intensifies as India made a comeback after going down in the first ODI. The hosts sealed a close win in the second ODI thanks largely to MS Dhoni’s batting effort and spirited performance by the bowlers. Now at Rajkot both teams will be fighting it out to take a lead in this series. A high scoring game is expected as the venue; Saurashtra Cricket Association Stadium has hosted just one match so far which has full of run feast. In pursuit of England’s 325, the hosts scored 316 for nine in 50 overs. Also Read- India vs South Africa 3rd ODI: 7 Interesting facts you need to know about Rajkot India ODI Squad: MS Dhoni, Shikhar Dhawan, Virat Kohli, Amit Mishra, Ajinkya Rahane, Ambati Rayudu, Rohit Sharma, Stuart Binny, Gurkeerat Singh Mann, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Axar Patel, Suresh Raina, Mohit Sharma, Umesh Yadav, Harbhajan Singh. South Africa ODI Squad: Faf du Plessis, Kyle Abbott, Hashim Amla, Farhaan Behardien, Quinton de Kock, AB de Villiers, Jean-Paul Duminy, Imran Tahir, David Miller, Chris Morris, Kagiso Rabada, Khaya Zondo, Morne Morkel, Aaron Phangiso, Dale Steyn.
